movie.title: Hellgate
movie.description_intro: A motorcycle gang kidnaps a young woman, Josie, from a diner and brutally kills her. Many years later, the girl's father finds a magic crystal that can bring the life back to dead objects. He uses it to re-animate his daughter. He lets her seduce any young man that comes to visit the small town and then kills them. Four young students, two boys and two girls spend a vacation near the town, Hellgate. They hear about the story and get involved.
movie.description_full: A motorcycle gang kidnaps a young woman, Josie, from a diner and brutally kills her. Many years later, the girl's father finds a magic crystal that can bring the life back to dead objects. He uses it to re-animate his daughter. He lets her seduce any young man that comes to visit the small town and then kills them. Four young students, two boys and two girls spend a vacation near the town, Hellgate. They hear about the story and get involved.

movies.title: Ticker
movies.summary: Ray Nettles, a San Francisco detective, and his partner Fuzzy must take on to one of the most dangerous terrorist gangs in the city. When one of the terrorists, the beautiful scientist Claire Manning is arrested, Swann, the leader of the terrorists, claims he will explode bombs throughout the city if she will is not released. Because of the possible bloodshed, Nettles calls for the help of explosives expert Frank Glass...

movies.title: 3 Lives
movies.summary: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.
movies.description_full: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.
movies.synopsis: A woman on the run from ruthless kidnappers discovers her rescuer is the man jailed for attacking her 15 years earlier.

movies.title: The Living Desert
movies.summary: A day in the life of creatures living in a desert in the southwestern US is shown. Toads, reptiles, wild pigs, insects, mice and birds are followed going about their daily routine and the struggle to find food and not become it themselves.

movies.title: Look to the Sky
movies.summary: A documentary that explores the power of hope through the inspiring true stories of young people who have demonstrated the spirit of Superman.
